issue.title: [Java][Flight][Tests] Add roundtrip tests for Java Flight Test Client
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7933](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7933). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There should be some built-in roundtrip tests for Java Flight IntegrationTestClient
